product_name: The North Face Sophia Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tough enough to battle wet, windy days yet stylish enough take out on the town, the Sophia women's rain jacket from The North Face makes sure that bad weather doesn't get in the way of a good time. 2-layer HyVent(R) fabric is waterproof and windproof while remaining lightweight and breathable; nylon taffeta lining is soft against skin. 35 in. length falls to mid-thigh. External adjustable belt; adjustable hood; internal media pocket with headphone port; zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Tough enough to battle wet, windy days yet stylish enough take out on the town, the Sophia women's rain jacket from The North Face makes sure that bad weather doesn't get in the way of a good time.
